feedback.title: 提供反馈

power.title: 电源管理
power.subtitle: 电源设置
power.description: 在此部分中可动态调节散热性能并最大化电池使用时间。它还具有其他常用的电源相关功能。您可以检查此部分中的缺省设置，并根据需要自定义您的系统。

powerSmartSettings.title: 电源智能设置
powerSmartSettings.subtitle: 智能散热
powerSmartSettings.description1: 此功能动态调节散热设置以满足您的需求。此功能开启时，在手持或空闲状态下可调节设置使设备保持较低温度或较低噪声。而设备放置在稳定平面上时，此功能可优化性能。此功能关闭时，您可以手动设置散热优先级。
powerSmartSettings.description2: 智能散热可调节风扇速度、最高表面温度和性能。此功能具有以下模式，且现在支持通过 Windows 性能电源滑块访问。

readMore.line1: 安静模式：滑块位于最左边。降低风扇速度和性能以使计算机温度更低、更安静，并且可获得最佳的电池使用时间。
readMore.line2: 平衡模式：滑块位于中央。以动态方式平衡风扇速度和性能以获得最佳体验。
readMore.line3: 性能模式：滑块位于最右边。提高风扇速度和允许的表面温度以获得最大性能。

airplanePower.title: 飞行电源模式
airplanePower.tooltip: 通过控制系统耗电量保护飞机交流电源插座。启用飞行电源模式后，计算机将通过限制电池充电速度和系统性能来降低耗电量。

batteryThreshold.title: 电池充电阈值
batteryThreshold.description: 如果主要在连接交流电源适配器时使用计算机，仅偶尔使用电池供电，则可通过将最大电量值设置为低于 100%，延长电池使用期限。这一点很有用，因为偶尔使用的电池保持不充满的电量可延长使用期限。
batteryThreshold.tooltip: 如果电池当前的充电电量高于停止充电阈值，则需要拔下电源，直至电池放电至停止充电阈值或低于停止充电阈值。 根据电池状态（新旧程度），开始或停止充电的精确点最大可有 2% 的相差幅度。如果启用此功能，建议偶尔执行一次“电池量表重置”，以确保电池运行状况报告准确。

popup.title: 启用电池充电阈值
popup.description: 在您使用此设备时，启用自定义电池充电可延长电池的整体使用寿命。然而，未能完全充满电将减少电池使用寿命。 为完全发挥此功能的作用，请拔下计算机的电源插头并消耗电池电量，使电池电量达到或低于停止充电阈值。

expressCharging.title: 快速充电
expressCharging.tooltip: 快速充电可用比常规模式更快的速度将电池充满电。

tooltip.line1: 此功能可有助于延长插电使用时的电池寿命。
tooltip.line2: 启用此模式时，电池只充至容量的 55-60%，从而最大化电池使用寿命。但是，这将缩短断开交流电源后的计算机使用时间。
tooltip.line3: 注：快速充电和节电模式无法同时进行。如果启用其中一个模式，则将自动关闭另一个模式。

alwaysUSB.title: 持续 USB 供电
alwaysUSB.tooltip: 计算机处于睡眠、休眠或关机模式时，通过计算机上的 Always on USB 接口为 USB 设备充电。可从黄色或有特定丝网印刷图标的 USB 接口为智能手机或平板电脑充电。
alwaysUSB.checkbox: 计算机处于关闭状态时支持从笔记本电脑电池进行 USB 充电。

easyResume.title: 轻松恢复
easyResume.description: 如果频繁开合计算机外盖，则启用此功能可缩短恢复时间。
easyResume.tooltip: 如果频繁开合计算机外盖，则此功能将改善恢复时间。启用后，在合上计算机外盖时，它将进入低功耗模式，但如果在合上外盖后 15 分钟内重新打开外盖，则它将立即恢复。此功能还使笔记本电脑可在系统挂起之前尝试完成暂挂活动（如发送电子邮件或下载文件）。

vantageToolbar.title: Lenovo Vantage 工具栏
vantageToolbar.tooltip: 将 Vantage 工具栏固定到 Windows 任务栏以轻松地获取更多电池详细信息及访问快速设置。

audio.title: 音频
audio.subtitle: 音频设置
audio.description: 在此部分中可自动优化或手动对音频设置进行全面配置，例如 Dolby 设置、麦克风等。

audioSmartsettings.title: 音频智能设置
audioSmartsettings.subtitle: 基于应用程序的设置
audioSmartsettings.description: 根据您使用的不同应用程序自动调节音频设置。

dolby.title: 自动 Dolby 音频设置

audioSmartsettings.voip: 自动 VoIP 音频优化

microphone.title: 麦克风
microphone.tooltip: You can customize your MIC effect by adjusting the microphone volume and specify appropriate mode.

volume.title: 麦克风音量
volume.description: Dolby 音频可为您喜爱的所有内容提供丰富、清晰、震撼的音效，请为您的内容和设备选择合适的模式。

suppress.title: 抑制键盘噪音
suppress.tooltip: Toggle this on to optimize the MIC audio by suppressing keyboard noise.

acoustic.title: 声学回音消除技术
acoustic.tooltip: Toggle on this feature to optimize your MIC audio by reducing acoustic echo.

optimize.title: 优化麦克风：
optimize.tooltip: 配置麦克风效果以增强不同场景和环境下的音频体验。

displayCamera.title: 显示屏和摄像头
displayCamera.subtitle: 显示和摄像头设置
displayCamera.description: 在此部分中可提升视觉体验及配置摄像头属性。在这里探索更多功能，并自定义个性化的显示体验。

eyeCareMode.title: 护眼模式
eyeCareMode.checkbox: 设定从日出到日落的护眼模式
eyeCareMode.tooltip: Eye Care Mode adjusts the color temperature of your display to filter out blue light and reduce eye strain.

camera.title: 摄像头
camera.note: 注：Lenovo Vantage 无权访问您的摄像头。请允许 Lenovo Vantage 应用访问您的摄像头。
camera.url: 转到 Windows 隐私设置

cameraPrivacy.title: 摄像头隐私模式
cameraPrivacy.tooltip: The camera stops sending live images when the privacy setting is enabled. Turn this setting on, only when you do not want to share your images to others while video calling.

camera.title: 摄像头
camera.tooltip: Click here to reset Camera properties to default settings.

popup.rebootForceMsg: The update(s) you selected will cause the system to reboot automatically after installation.
popup.shutdownForceMsg: The update(s) you selected will cause the system to shut down automatically after installation.
popup.rebootDelayedMsg: The update(s) you selected will cause the system to reboot after installation, during the installation of updates, please do not turn off your system, remove power source or accessories. We recommend saving your work in preparation for your system rebooting.
popup.rebootRequiredMsg: In order to successfully install the updates your computer needs a reboot to ensure everything is running safe and smoothly.

critical.title: 关键更新
critical.tooltip: Critical updates can prevent significant problem, major malfunctions, hardware failure, or data corruption.

recommended.title: 推荐更新
recommended.tooltip: Recommended driver updates keep your computer running at optimal performance.

banner.title: ​保持最新状态的系统才是健康的系统。
banner.next: 下次更新扫描计划时间：
banner.description: 这些软件包包含对计算机的正常运行至关重要的硬件驱动程序更新和其他系统实用程序更新。关键更新对保护计算机上的数据来说也很重要，一旦可用就应该尽快安装。未能安装这些软件包可能会导致数据丢失、系统故障或硬件故障

fail.title: Some updates were not installed correctly.
fail.description: Something went wrong during the downloading or installation of these updates. Please make sure you are online and don't turn off computer when installing these updates.

warranty.subDescription1: 本产品具有若干年的有限保修，并有权送往维修站获得维修服务。客户可以致电其当地服务中心来获取更多信息。经销商可对本产品提供送修服务。
warranty.subDescription2: 我们无法找到适用于您设备的保修详细信息，要获取更多保修选项，请访问我们的支持网站。

quicklinks.title: 快速链接
quicklinks.listETicket: 通过电子凭单获取支持

landing.notFullyDesc: You are not fully protected. Learn how to better protect yourself now.
landing.maliciousNetwork: Prevented your computer from joining {{maliciousWifi}} malicious networks this month.

common.title: Anti-Virus
common.recommends: Lenovo recommends McAfee to protect all your devices with:
common.award: Award winning protection from the latest online threats including ransomware and malware
common.dedicated: Dedicated security that consistently outperforms Defender and other leading AV providers
common.deviceToCloud: Device to cloud technology that won't slow down your PC
common.privacyTerms: Read more on the <tag>Privacy Policy</tag> and <tag>Terms of Service</tag>
common.betterProtected: .However, you could be better protected with McAfee LifeSafe

windowsDefender.subtitle: You are currently being protected by Windows Defender.However, you could be better protected with McAfee LiveSafe. Learn more below.
windowsDefender.windowsSubtitle: Windows defender offers basic protection for your device

mcafee.title: McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.subtitle: You are currently protected by McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.awardSubtitle: Blocks viruses, malware, ransomware, spyware, unwanted program and more on your PC.
mcafee.encryptedSubtitle: Keep sensitive files private by storing them on your PC with 128-bit encryption.
mcafee.identitySubtitle: Take charge of protecting your identity from theft and fraud.
mcafee.supportSubtitle: Has you covered by phone, by chat, or online for the life of your subscription.
mcafee.antiSubtitle: Blocks dangerous messages before they reach your inbox by removing emails that may include risky links and viruses.
mcafee.virusSubtitle: Provides you with the confidence that in the event your PC gets a virus, a McAfee expert will remotely access your computer to remove it.
mcafee.parentalSubtitle: Block web sites and search results you don’t want your kids to see. Also lets you set limits for how much time they spend online.

others.othersProtection: offers you basic protection for your device

container.title: Lenovo Wifi Security
container.name: WIFI SECURITY
container.disableDecribe: Lenovo WiFi Security is an advanced cloud-based software service that helps your device differentiate safe wireless networks from potentially malicious ones.

threatlocator.describe: Use the threat detector to determine the safety of the networks around you.

locationmodal.title: Enable location services
locationmodal.describe: To use Lenovo WiFi Security, you need to enable location services for Lenovo Vantage. Would you like to enable location now?

homesecurity.title: Connected Home Security
homesecurity.titleDescription: Connected Home Security keeps you safe in three ways:
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect1: Connected Home Security ensures your device is safe, and has not been compromised
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect2: Connected Home Security ensures that the networks you are connected to are safe
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect3: Connected Home Security ensures that other devices connected to your home network are safe.
homesecurity.describe: Unsafe devices and networks can introduce malware, lead to identity theft, and leak private and financial information. Enable this feature to reduce the risk of having your device, and your home network exposed to attackers
homesecurity.subtitle: Peace of Mind
homesecurity.subtitleDescribe: Connected Home Security will send you an alert if it detects a vulnerability in your device or home network, or if you are connected to a potentially malicious network. Learn even more in about Connected Home Security in Tips and Tricks.

invitationcode.buttonDescribe: enter invitation code require enable wifi security
invitationcode.title: Already have Connected Home Security?
invitationcode.titleDescribe: Add this device to your Connected Home
invitationcode.canUse: You can now start using Connected Home Security

securityhealth.title: Security Health
securityhealth.learnMoreAboutSecurityHealth: Learn more about each of these components <tag>here.</tag>
securityhealth.peaceOfMind: Do you want more peace of mind?

vpn.title: VPN Security
vpn.whatIsSufEasy: SurfEasy is a VPN, or Virtual Private Network provider that helps protect you while you are surfing the internet. Without a VPN, your PC may be more vulnerable to attackers and identity thieves. A VPN runs silently in the background and provides additional safety and privacy measures while you use the internet.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy1: A Virtual Private Network provider helps you protect while you are surfing the internet. Without a VPN, your pc may be more vulnerable to attackers and identity thieves. A VPN runs silently in the background and provides safety and privacy measures.
vpn.whySufEasyDescription: SurfEasy makes it easy to stay safe while surfing the internet. It helps you remain anonymous, and adds an additional layer of security between you and anyone that wants your personal information.
vpn.startUseSufEasy1: Using a VPN adds Security. SurfEasy encrypts your data, adding anonymity and security.
vpn.startUseSufEasy2: Once registered SurfEasy runs silently in the background so everything runs the same but better.
vpn.startUseSufEasy3: Start using SurfEasy to protect yourself while browsing the internet. Enjoy the no-log VPN that works on every device.
vpn.startUseSufEasy4: As a surfEasy user enjoy 250 MB of free data every 30 days! Unlock additional data by following the steps on the "Rewards" tab of the SurfEasy app.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy2: A VPN provider helps to protect you while you are surfing the internet. Without a VPN, our PC may be moe vulnerable to attackers and identity thieves. A VPN runs silently in the bacground and provides safety and privacy measures.
vpn.getStarted1: After installing SurfEasy, register and make an account.
vpn.getStarted2: Log in with your secure credentials.
vpn.getStarted3: Wait for confirmation to know you are connected, and then begin browsing securely.
vpn.howToGetData2: Add second device and earn +250 Mb
vpn.howToGetData3: Refer a friend and earn +500 MB
vpn.howToGetData4: Like SurfEasy on Facebook and earn +100 MB
vpn.howToGetData5: Follow SurfEasy on Twitter and earn +100 MB
vpn.privacyPolicyAndTermsOfService: Read more on the <tag>Privacy Policy</tag> and <tag>Terms of Service</tag>

passwordManager.title: Password Health
passwordManager.whatIsPmNotInstalled: The safest, easiest way to save strong, complex passwords and log in instantly on every site.
passwordManager.whatIsPmInstalled: A safer digital life is waiting: Add passwords, enable Dark Web Monitoring and autofill personal and payment info.
passwordManager.startProtect: Start protecting your online accounts the simple way.
passwordManager.learnMoreAbout: <tag>Learn more</tag> about making the most of DashLane
passwordManager.whatIsDashLane: DashLane is a password manager and digital protection app that works with your browser. It automatically saves passwords and personal data, remembers it all for you, and stores everything securely. Dashlane also analyzes your account security and provides easy ways to improve your password health.
passwordManager.helpYou2: Log in instantly everywhere for seamless browsing
passwordManager.helpYou3: Sync across devices so you're never without access to important accounts
passwordManager.helpYou4: Improve your online protection with easy, actionable advice
passwordManager.checkOutThisGuide: Use DashLane to stay safe online while saving time and frustration. For detailed instructions on how to get started, <tag>check out this guide.</tag>
passwordManager.allowsYou1: Log in instantly every where for seamless Browsing-Sync across devices so you're never without access to important accounts
passwordManager.allowsYou2: Monitor the dark web for your personal information
passwordManager.allowsYou3: Stay safe on unsecured WiFi networks with built in VPN
passwordManager.allowsYou4: Share passwords securely without revealing them
passwordManager.privacyPolicyAndTermsOfService: Read more on the <tag>Privacy Policy</tag> and <tag>Terms of Service</tag>

windowsHello.title: Windows Hello
windowsHello.protectYourDevice: Protect your device with these Lenovo recommended security options.
windowsHello.signIn: Sign in quickly and securely with Windows Hello.
windowsHello.whyWindowsHelloDescription1: Windows Hello makes logging into your PC easier and more secure, and can also be used for your online Microsoft apps. Follow the instructions below to begin using Windows Hello.
windowsHello.visitAndRegister: Visit the Windows Hello page and register your fingerprint.
windowsHello.visitInSettings: <tag> Visit Windows Hello</tag> in system settings
windowsHello.unlock: Use Windows Hello to log into and unlock your PC with a touch of a finger on the sensor.
windowsHello.startUsingWindowsHello: Start using Windows Hello to log into Microsoft Apps such as Outlook, OneDrive, Office 365 and Xbox Live.
windowsHello.whyWindowsHelloDescription2: Windows Hello makes logging into your PC easier and more secure. And you can also be used for your online Microsoft apps. Follow the instructions below to begin using Windows Hello
windowsHello.traditional: Traditional passwords can be stolen and used to access your account from anywhere in the world. More secure and convinient. Windows Hello is the next generation of a password. Use your fingerprint reader [or IR camera] instead of insecure passwords to log in.
windowsHello.howToStart: How do I start using Windows Hello?
